thread.title: BRIEF-Credit Corp Group ‍Posts HY Profit For Period Attributable Of $29.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Credit Corp Group ‍Posts HY Profit For Period Attributable Of $29.8 Mln

organizations.name: brief-credit corp group ‍posts hy profit for period

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Credit Corp Group Ltd:
* ‍HY PROFIT FOR PERIOD ATTRIBUTABLE TO MEMBERS $29.8 MILLION, UP 18 PERCENT
* HY REVENUE $147.6 MILLION VERSUS $129.1 MLN‍​ * DECLARED 2018 INTERIM DIVIDEND ‍​OF 31.00 CENTS PER SHARE FULLY FRANKED
* REAFFIRMS FY2018 NPAT GUIDANCE UPGRADED IN NOV 2017‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
